mapper.update: UPDATE document SET document_location = #{documentLocation} WHERE document_id = #{documentId}'
mapper.select: SELECT document_location FROM document WHERE document_id = #{documentId}

select doc.document_id, doc.document_title, doc.document_no, doc.document_confidential, doc.creation_time, gu.user_name, dt.documenttype_name, de.department_name, pr.process_name FROM document doc, documenttype dt, department de, guser gu, process pr WHERE doc.document_type = dt.documenttype_id AND doc.document_dept = de.department_id AND doc.document_user = gu.user_id AND doc.document_process = pr.process_id AND doc.document_state = #{documentState}

SELECT doc.document_id, doc.document_title, doc.document_no, doc.document_confidential, doc.creation_time, gu.user_name, dt.documenttype_name, de.department_name, pr.process_name FROM document doc, documenttype dt, department de, guser gu, process pr WHERE doc.document_type = dt.documenttype_id AND doc.document_dept = de.department_id AND doc.document_user = gu.user_id AND doc.document_process = pr.process_id

SELECT doc.document_id, doc.document_title, doc.document_no, doc.document_confidential, doc.doucment_content, doc.document_remark, doc.document_location, doc.document_process_begin, doc.document_process_finish, doc.document_state, doc.document_speed, doc.creation_time, gu.user_name, dt.documenttype_name, de.department_name, pr.process_name FROM document doc, documenttype dt, department de, guser gu, process pr WHERE doc.document_type = dt.documenttype_id AND doc.document_dept = de.department_id AND doc.document_user = gu.user_id AND doc.document_process = pr.process_id and doc.document_id = #{documentId,jdbcType=CHAR}

SELECT doc.document_id, doc.document_title, doc.document_no, doc.document_confidential, doc.creation_time, gu.user_name, dt.documenttype_name, de.department_name, pr.process_name FROM document doc, documenttype dt, department de, guser gu, process pr WHERE document_process = #{documentProcess} and document_location =#{documentLocation}
